thread.title: Winnipeggers 'an eccentric bunch,' says new tourism campaign
thread.title_full: Winnipeggers 'an eccentric bunch,' says new tourism campaign

title: Winnipeggers 'an eccentric bunch,' says new tourism campaign
text:
The city is a symphony that just can't be missed, according to a new video from Tourism Winnipeg. 
The new "lure" video depicts Winnipeg Symphony Orchestra conductor Alexander Micklethwaite on a journey through the city. 
"To say we're an eccentric bunch is an understatement," Micklethwaite says to open the video, peeling cucumber slices off his eyes in a spa. "We may do things a little different around here ... but we think you will like it." 
The Winnipeg transplant also lists off the local seasons: "Patio season,""festival season,""shopping season ... and of course, winter." 
"With Winnipeg gaining momentum and growing as a travel destination, we want to showcase all of the exciting assets the city has to offer with a hip, fun, dynamic video establishing the personality and pizzazz we are looking for that truly represents Winnipeg," said Chantal Sturk-Nadeau, senior vice president for Tourism Winnipeg , in a release. 
The video was shot and edited by Tripwire Media Group Inc., a Winnipeg production company. Reader's comments Â»
